title: At 6 AM Melvin Tocker, the superintendent of the Pallizzio shoe factory at the east end of the block, begins the day sweeping the sidewalk.  The cars have been brought out of the garage across the street and wait for their owners.
dimensions: sheet (trimmed to image): 24.7 x 34.5 cm (9 3/4 x 13 9/16 in.)
creditline: Robert Frank Collection, Gift of Robert Frank
